summary.span: 表示具有固定整數位數和小數位數的數值，介於 - 10^38 +1 和 10^38 - 1 之間。

span.span: Represents a numeric value between - 10^38 +1 and 10^38 - 1, with fixed precision and scale.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有不同的基礎資料結構，從其對應的.NET Framework資料型別。 has different underlying data structures from its corresponding .NET Framework data type. 有沒有有效位數的概念。 has no concept of precision. 它會使用 3 個位元組儲存實際的資料，因此有 28 個規模上限。It uses 3 bytes to store the actual data, and therefore has a maximum scale of 28. 資料範圍是-79228162514264337593543950335 到 79228162514264337593543950335。The data range is -79,228,162,514,264,337,593,543,950,335 through 79,228,162,514,264,337,593,543,950,335. 具有有效位數和小數位數。 has both precision and scale. 它會使用 4 個不帶正負號的 4 位元組整數儲存實際的資料，因此具有最大有效位數和小數點位數為 38。It uses 4 unsigned 4-byte integers to store the actual data, and therefore has maximum precision and scale of 38. 資料範圍為-10 ^38 + 1 到 10 ^38-1。The data range is - 10^38 +1 through 10^38 - 1.
